page.title: 14Population and housing.
page.content: Family sizes are generally small and consist on average of 2 parents and 2 children.Families with 3 or 4 children are unusual.Few families have elderly parents living with them and the trend towards increasd divorce is leading to more {single parent {families.}The birth rate is low and consequently the population is gradually becoming more{aged.}A higher standard of living and improvements in living standards in recent years has resulted in people living longer. A survey carried out in the Hardy Road area of Bishops Cleeve showed a very high proportion of people aged over 65 years.The people living in this area have retired to easily maintained bungalows with small gardens on the edge of a village which provides all the essential services.
